pagination.canUserPref: Allow users to set the loading mode of DiscussionList
pagination.paginationOnLoading-Help: Pagination mode will be applied to both forum home page and user personal page
pagination.paginationPosition: Select position of pagination navigation bar
pagination.perPage: Pagination Mode: Capacity of DiscussionList per page (1-50)
pagination.perLoadMore: LoadMore Mode: The amount of discussions per LoadMore (1-50)
pagination.perIndexInit: LoadMore Mode: The amount of discussions in first page (1-50)
pagination.cacheDiscussions: Cache DiscussionList to reduce server load
pagination.cacheDiscussions-Help: Only for pagination mode, LoadMore mode is not affected. It is recommended to use with real-time notification plugins.

settings.head: DiscussionList - Loading Mode
settings.userCustom: Enable personalization (When closed, load by forum preset mode)
